meanings.sent1: The mechanic used a levier to lift the heavy engine.
meanings.sent2: She pushed down on the levier to raise the platform.
meanings.sent3: The levier in the playground seesaw made the game more fun.
meanings.sent4: His words acted as a levier, shifting opinions effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The bright red levier stood out against the dark machinery.

meanings.definition: To lever is to lift or move something using a lever.
meanings.sent1: He had to levier the rock to reveal the hidden treasure.
meanings.sent2: She carefully levered the lid off the jar.
meanings.sent3: The burglar tried to levier the window open quietly.
meanings.sent4: She levered her way through the crowded room to reach the exit.
meanings.sent5: The strong man easily levered the heavy box onto the shelf.
